title: Options
description: Options that can be configured for each Function. All the available types of options are found in the definitions.

name.description: The name of the option. Can be used to reference this option. Should be unique within scope of function.

label.description: The label for option, as shown in the IDE.

info.description: Can be used to give more info on what this option does.

advanced.description: Flag to determine wether to show this in regular or advanced options.
